hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH MY_REPO_DIR=/localdisk/designer/${USER}/${JOB_NAME}/v2/repoes MIRROR_DIR=/export/mirror/ IMAGE_NAME=debian-downloads-downloader-v3-${USER} CONTAINER_NAME=debian-downloads-downloader-v3b-${USER} GIT_ROOT=$HOME/cengn-debian-dl/debian-cengn GIT_NAME=debian-dl GIT_URL=https://github.com/starlingx-staging/$GIT_NAME
mkdir -p ${MY_REPO_DIR}
if [ ! -d $GIT_ROOT ]; then mkdir -p $GIT_ROOT fi
cd $GIT_ROOT
if [ ! -d $GIT_ROOT/$GIT_NAME ]; then git clone $GIT_URL fi
cd $GIT_ROOT/$GIT_NAME
git pull
cd $GIT_ROOT/$GIT_NAME/debian-cengn
if docker image ls | grep -q ${IMAGE_NAME}; then echo "found pre-existing docker image '${IMAGE_NAME}'" else echo "build docker image '${IMAGE_NAME}'" pushd docker/ docker build --build-arg MYUID=$(id -u) --build-arg MYUNAME=${USER} -t ${IMAGE_NAME} -f Dockerfile . popd fi
docker run -t --rm --name ${CONTAINER_NAME} \ -v $PWD/opt:/opt \ -v $PWD/inputs:/inputs \ -v ${MY_REPO_DIR}:/repoes \ -v $MIRROR_DIR:/outputs \ ${IMAGE_NAME}
